ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] A recap of the 6/6 patch.
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah - I bout choked on this one myself. Wow - what an elegant way to cop out. ... with the subject submissions.
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah - I bout choked on this one myself. Wow - what an elegant way to cop out.




At 10:25 AM 6/7/00 -0500, you wrote:
>The "Broken Quest Issues" are not broken quests. They are preexisting
>stories for future expansion.
>*Not sure if this applies to Fabian or not.
>
>So... we have (to the best of my memory) an NPC that mentions an instrument,
>but there is no quest (Qeynos); an NPC that offers a bard weapon, but there
>is no quest (Temple of Sol); and a quest that involves telling a low 20's
>druid (the hermit in SK) "I'll kill you" (or use AE song on him) to get him
>out of his house in order to get the quest items from his corpse, which
>eventually results in a few silver, some exp, and a random level 1-4 song.
>Other than those, what other bard quests need looking into?
>
>-=B=-
>
>

with the subject submissions.
